title: Spinal Tap
summaries: The Spinal Tap is a pre-Hardmode post-Skeletron whip crafted from Cobwebs and Bones.
Like other whips, it causes minions to focus on the last-struck enemy and increases their damage against the target.
If the Spinal Tap hits multiple targets in a single attack, the damage dealt by each consecutive hit will be reduced by 10%.

statistics.Tooltip:
7 summon tag damage
Your summons will focus struck enemies
Performs better against multiple targets than most whips
'This goes to eleven'
statistics.Sell: 150
